thread.title: Nicole Scherzinger heads to Nobu in 90s denim and leather | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Nicole Scherzinger heads to Nobu in 90s denim and leather | Daily Mail Online

author: Naomi Ackerman For Mailonline
title: Nicole Scherzinger heads to Nobu in 90s denim and leather | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share And time in South Africa's balmy weather shooting workouts for the advert has left Nicole glowing with health. The singer showed off her incredibly toned legs in a tiny leather miniskirt teamed with shiny black boots, cut off a couple of inches above her ankle. Sexy: Bright red lips added another sexy element to Nicole's outfit choice, culminating in another of her trademark laid back-yet-sultry looks The singer showed off her incredibly toned legs in a tiny leather miniskirt teamed with shiny black boots, cut off a couple of inches above her ankle Killer heels: Posing by the restaurant entrance, the 38-year-old singer spun around and flashing a sultry gaze into the cameras, exhibiting her sexy ankle boots and snakeskin bag Lending a relaxed look to the ensemble, Nicole added a loose fitting white strappy top and baggy ripped denim jacket. Earlier on Monday Nicole attended the Aspinal of London press day in London. The singer looked relaxed yet sexy as she flaunted her svelte physique in a cropped jumper with an artfully frayed hem and racy Perspex trim heels - and the heels further emphasised the stunning singer's long, toned legs. But the Pussycat Doll revealed a little more than she bargained for as she climbed into her waiting car on leaving the event - exposing a little more peachy derriere than she intended. Though the put-together star seemed completely unbothered by the mishap as she sped away in her waiting car. Body goals: Earlier in the day, Nicole flaunted her svelte physique in a cropped jumper with an artfully frayed hem and racy Perspex trim heels Wave: Nicole left her glossy brunette locks cascade down her shoulder in a chic wave Uh oh: Nicole accidentally showcased a bit too much of her peachy derriere as she left the event and got into her waiting car Settling in! The American beauty elegantly made her way into her luxury car Former TOWIE star and fitness entrepreneur Lucy Mecklenburgh also attended the event, The 25-year-old looked chic and sophisticated in a bright red casual suit with a plunging neckline. The brunette beauty had managed to maintain her tan two weeks after jetting home from Dubai as she sported a healthy glow at the event. A blossoming Binky Felstead also showed up, showcasing her growing baby bump in a striped shirt and proving it is possible to be both pregnant and super stylish. Her MIC co-stars Rosie Fortescue and Hugo Taylor also put in appearances, as did model David Gandy and party-loving aristocrat Lady Victoria Hervey. Stunning: Lucy Mecklenburgh, 25, managed to retain that holiday glow as she attended the Aspinal of London press day in London on Sunday Glowing mother-to-be! Binky Felstead showcased her growing baby bump in a striped shirt Keeping good company: Rosie Fortescue rocked a belted white shirt while model David Gandy kept it cool in leather Double trouble: Union J star Josh Cuthbert posed with his stunning model girlfriend Chloe Lloyd Check her out! Lady Victoria Hervey looked chic in a houndstooth midi dress and red bag Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
